title: Is White House Invoking the Stafford Act to Impose a Quarantine and Mobilize the National Guard?
subtitle: Announcements of a "national lockdown" or "mandatory quarantine" would not be made via viral text messages.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The White House sent out text messages in mid-March 2020 informing people that a "mandatory quarantine" in U.S. would start within 48 hours.
